node.text: What now? Nothing like this has ever happened before.~ It's difficult to return to normal life after such an upheaval.~ Forgive me, kendren, but the sight of you makes my hands quake.~ Oh? Is it really over? I'm afraid.
How Bey Lah prospers! We should have opened the village years ago.~ Live and drink.~ Live and drink, kendren.~ Oh, it is you. Thank you for helping the village.

I will admit, Hindriarch Esk leads well.~ Can we really trust such a young Hindriarch?~ I am both afraid and hopeful for our future. But perhaps this is what we need.~ Oh, it is you. Thank you for helping the village.

Ah, l-live and drink.~ Live and drink...~ Live... live and drink, kendren.~ Um.~ Please go away.~ W-w-w-w-what are ... what are you...~ Moon and sun, kendren.~ Live and drink. Will you be staying long?~ Forgiveness begged, kendren. I have work to do.~ Live and drink, kendren. I am very busy.~ You're... kendren...~ Please don't hurt me.~ Ah... uhm. I... you, ah.~ {{emote|*the hindren stares at you, wide-eyed*}}
